The list of gh-packages:
...> gh api user/packages/maven/io.github.krm-demo.core-utils/versions

The list of workflows:
...> gh workflow list

Latest runs of workflow 'on-main-push':
...> gh workflow view on-main-push

View the content of workflow YAML-script:
...> gh workflow view on-main-push.yml --yaml

Latest runs of workflow 'latest-info':
...> gh workflow view latest-info

Latest result of workflow run 'latest-info':
...> gh run list --workflow="misc--latest-info.yml"
...> gh run view 18723240572
...> gh run view 18723240572 --log
